text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly mentions and discusses Article VII(1) of the New York Convention in the introductory section: \"US courts apply a 'pro-enforcement bias' when reviewing foreign arbitral awards under Article VII(1) of the New York Convention (implemented via 9 U.S.C. \u00a7\u00a7 201 et seq., Chapter 2 of the Federal Arbitration Act ('FAA')).\" This directly satisfies the criterion requiring mention of Article VII.", "criterion_id": "78fd18d0-9c23-4147-855e-44a9ee3a1b64"}
